name: new-ticket
description: Email notification sent when a new ticket is created.
subject: Ticket #{{ticket.uid}} Created - {{ticket.subject}}

data.gjs-html:
Ticket #{{ticket.uid}}
Created by {{ticket.owner.fullname}} in group {{ticket.group.name}}
{{ticket.priority.name}} | {{ticket.type.name}}
{{#if ticket.owner.image}}
{{else}}
{{/if}}
{{ticket.subject}}
{{ticket.owner.fullname}} - {{ticket.owner.email}}
{{formatDate ticket.date "MM-DD-YYYY HH:mm"}}
{{{ticket.issue}}}
View Ticket #{{ticket.uid}}
